thread.title: Bills bulk up the backfield, sign Mike Tolbert
thread.title_full: Bills bulk up the backfield, sign Mike Tolbert

author: Darin Gantt
title: Bills bulk up the backfield, sign Mike Tolbert
text:
Mar 8, 2017 4:47 PM 
Few teams even have one fullback nowadays, but two?? Mar 8, 2017 4:50 PM 
We will miss you Mike… you are a class act. Much luck up north. gadzod says: Mar 8, 2017 4:50 PM 
It’s obvious. Everybody outside of Buffalo that doesn’t watch their games think Tyrod is a good QB because of his low INT numbers, while discounting being dead last in passing. They get fullbacks because if they don’t, McCoy can’t run against a stacked box every play, meaning no yards will be produced. Watkins is an All-Pro WR, but Tyrod can’t get him the ball… Mar 8, 2017 4:51 PM 
McCoy, Gillislee, the rookie RB from last years draft, 2 fullbacks? Seems crowded…???? wizwix says: Mar 8, 2017 4:52 PM 
Sweet. Bills are going to field a rugby team. Which makes sense since you gotta try something different to get into the playoffs… Everything else has been done, right?? 60ftlesbianoctopus says: Mar 8, 2017 4:57 PM 
Bills had like 8 no name receivers on roster last season. I’d rather have big name fullbacks than no name receivers who couldn’t catch a cold. Leave a Reply
